alert.note: Alert for Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Phoenix (Central Arizona and California Desert)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 7:03PM MST by NWS Phoenix
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Maricopa County through 745 PM MST... At 703 PM MST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 12 miles south of Gila Bend Auxiliary Field, or 17 miles south of Gila Bend, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of Maricopa County. This includes AZ Route 85 between mile markers 12 and 25. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Gila Bend; Sonoran Desert Natl Monument
